amendment.description: Amendment sought to transfer $90 million to to the Department of Veterans Affairs for veterans health care and for the establishment of medical emergency preparedness centers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in the Congressional Record adds $70 milion for Veterans Administration health care preparedness and adds $20 million for the first year of operations of four VA bioterrorism centers previously authorized.
